properties.areaDesc: Long Island Sound East of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson NY; Peconic and Gardiners Bays; Long Island Sound West of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson NY; South Shore Bays from Jones Inlet through Shinnecock Bay
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 4 at 3:32PM EST until January 5 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, Northwest winds 15 to 25 kt with
gusts up to 35 kt expected. For the Small Craft Advisory,
Northwest winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt expected. For
the Dense Fog Advisory, dense fog will reduce visibility to than
one mile.

* WHERE...The Long Island Sound, Peconic and Gardiners Bays, and
South Shore Bays from Jones Inlet through Shinnecock Bay.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 6 AM to 6 PM EST Sunday. For
the Dense Fog Advisory, until 6 PM EST this evening. For the
Small Craft Advisory, from midnight tonight to 6 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft. Through
this afternoon, low visibility will make navigation difficult.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM EST SUNDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM EST SUNDAY
